title: Dynamic Multimedia Learning Design for Understanding Organic Chemistry

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Structured to enable intuitive understanding of organic chemistry concepts through everyday examples encountered by learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain and reproduce organic chemistry reaction mechanisms step-by-step through visual animations.
Learners can explore and explain the relationship between molecular structural formulas and actual molecular motion via VR simulations.
Learners can analyze representative organic reactions (e.g., aldol reactions) using multimedia tools and investigate real-world application cases.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
